backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, residents, and clinical data types with access‑controlled CRUD operations and internal ID management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, forms, hooks, and print layout.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and layout shell.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays resident ADL records in a table with an add-record modal when write access is allowed.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record with required fields and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable access denied screen with warning icon and navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial user profile setup, collecting name, role, and optional related resident IDs before saving via mutation.
Layout wrapper providing authentication handling, login screen, and main app shell with header, footer, and content area.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records with medication names and allows adding new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for creating a new MAR record by selecting an active medication and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Shows a resident’s medications with status, edit and discontinue actions, and an option to add new medications when allowed.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for adding a new medication with dosage, schedule, prescribing physician, and notes, then submitting via mutation.
Provides a modal form for editing an existing medication, updating its fields and submitting changes via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal for creating a new resident with full details, including physicians, contacts, medications, insurance, and pharmacy info.
Modal allowing updates to a resident’s core information, physicians, and pharmacy data using a mutation call.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a multi‑page printable resident profile report including demographics, medications, and optional physician signatures.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of daily vital records for a resident and allows adding new entries if permissions allow.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal for entering and submitting a new daily vitals record with validation for required fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and related data using the backend actor with permission checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS theme variables, base styles, dark mode, and detailed print-specific styles.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Contains permission helper functions for checking admin/staff access, resident access, and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays resident management dashboard with filtering, sorting, stats, and actions like add, discharge, and delete based on user permissions.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Shows an individual resident profile with tabs, editing, printing, and access control based on user permissions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL-derived values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, layout settings, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, existing features, and pending feature requests for adding physician name/signature print options.
